page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
(See also page 11)
24 people are employed in the area in agriculture. This is a very consider- able drop in numbers. Other employment within the area includes Carsons Transport, Solway Marine Boat Building Dalawoodie Nursing Home, A.Hastings' Joiners' Shop, Blacksmith, Holywood Post Office, and Cowhill Estate. {Local people}also find employment outside the area in Dumfries. This includes teaching, medicine and auxiliary hospital work, chemical surveying, council employment, the ICI, Uniroyal and Carnation factories, the AA, building trades, shops and offices.
Those unemployed are mainly unskilled and number 18, which is about 6% of the adult population of about 300.
